url.description: URL to the organization's API endpoint.

repos_url.description: URL to fetch repositories of the organization.

events_url.description: URL to fetch events related to the organization.

hooks_url.description: URL to manage webhooks for the organization.

issues_url.description: URL to fetch issues related to the organization.

members_url.description: URL to fetch members of the organization.

public_members_url.description: URL to fetch public members of the organization.

avatar_url.description: URL to the avatar image of the organization.

company.description: Name of the company associated with the organization.

blog.description: URL to the blog of the organization.

is_verified.description: Indicates if the organization is verified.

has_organization_projects.description: Indicates if the organization has projects.

has_repository_projects.description: Indicates if the organization has projects tied to repositories.

public_repos.description: Number of public repositories owned by the organization.

public_gists.description: Number of public gists created by the organization.

followers.description: Number of followers the organization has.

following.description: Number of accounts the organization is following.

html_url.description: URL to the organization's profile page.

created_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the organization was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the organization was last updated.

archived_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the organization was archived.

total_private_repos.description: Total number of private repositories owned by the organization.

owned_private_repos.description: Number of private repositories owned by the organization.

private_gists.description: Number of private gists created by the organization.

disk_usage.description: Disk space used by the organization.

collaborators.description: Number of collaborators the organization has.

billing_email.description: Email address associated with the organization's billing.

default_repository_permission.description: Default permission level for new repositories.

members_can_create_repositories.description: Indicates if members can create repositories.

two_factor_requirement_enabled.description: Indicates if two-factor authentication is required for the organization.

members_allowed_repository_creation_type.description: Type of repositories members are allowed to create.

members_can_create_public_repositories.description: Indicates if members can create public repositories.

members_can_create_private_repositories.description: Indicates if members can create private repositories.

members_can_create_internal_repositories.description: Indicates if members can create internal repositories.

members_can_create_pages.description: Indicates if members can create pages.

members_can_fork_private_repositories.description: Indicates if members can fork private repositories.

web_commit_signoff_required.description: Indicates if web commit signoff is required for the organization.

members_can_create_public_pages.description: Indicates if members can create public pages.

members_can_create_private_pages.description: Indicates if members can create private pages.

plan.description: Information about the subscription plan of the organization.

space.description: Space available in the organization's plan.

private_repos.description: Number of private repositories allowed in the organization's plan.

filled_seats.description: Number of filled seats in the organization's plan.

seats.description: Total number of seats in the organization's plan.

advanced_security_enabled_for_new_reposi.description: Indicates if advanced security features are enabled for new repositories within the organization.

dependabot_alerts_enabled_for_new_reposi.description: Indicates if dependabot alerts are enabled for new repositories within the organization.

dependabot_security_updates_enabled_for_.description: Indicates if dependabot security updates are enabled for new repositories within the organization.

dependency_graph_enabled_for_new_reposit.description: Indicates if dependency graph is enabled for new repositories within the organization.

secret_scanning_enabled_for_new_reposito.description: Indicates if secret scanning is enabled for new repositories within the organization.

secret_scanning_push_protection_enabled_.description: Indicates if secret scanning push protection is enabled for new repositories.

secret_scanning_push_protection_custom_l.description: Indicates if custom link for secret scanning push protection is enabled.
Custom link for secret scanning push protection.
